title: 1st Floor 1B1Ba South Facing Available Now
posting_body: ['Acappella', '1001 National Ave, San Bruno, CA, 94066', 'Visit This Website to See More:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 81', 'OR Text', '81', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', 'Welcome Home to Acappella!', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 726 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Acappella Apartments at The Crossing Introduces Contemporary Luxury Living in the Heart of the San Francisco Peninsula.', "Positioned within San Bruno's The Crossing, Acappella boasts an ideal location with a variety of nearby shopping, dining, entertainment options, walking distance to 2 parks, and easy access to public transportation and major freeways.", 'The luxury apartments are masterfully crafted to create a quality living environment through a unique blend of timeless luxury design.', 'Features', '- Newly Upgraded Sound-tec Floating Floor Flooring', '- Quartz Countertops', '- Heating & Air Conditioning in Every Home', "- 9' High Ceiling", '- Hello Alfred!', 'The Properties Home Assistant', '- Spacious Walk-in Closets', '- GE Stainless Appliances', '- Extra-large Windows', '- Spa Inspired Shower Heads', '- USB Ports', '- Telecommunications System', '- Individual Patios and Balconies', '- GE Washer/Provided', 'Community Amenities', '- Lavish Interior Courtyard', '- (BART, CalTrain)', '- Outdoor Pool and Spa', '- Walking Distance to Shops', '- Underground Parking', '- Smoke-Free lifestyle in our community', '- Public Dog Park', '- BBQ grills', '- Fully Equipped 24/7 Fitness Center', '- Public Park', '- Close to Public Transportation', 'Driving Directions', "Once you turn onto National Ave you'll see 4 similar looking buildings, Acappella is the red building and you're able to drive underneath our waterfall to get to our visitor's parking.", "Take the elevator up just past our mailbox area to 1 and it'll bring you right in front of our office.", 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Friendly', 'lLx1jV9at']
